ExecutableTestSuite.label: Metadatenprofil GDI-NW für die Ressourcenart "Daten"
ExecutableTestSuite.description: Ausgehend von den Basisfestlegungen wurde die spezifische Profilausprägung für die Ressourcenart "Daten" (Datenbestand, Serie, Kachel, Objektart) abgeleitet bzw. die Festlegungen an den Stellen ausgedünnt, an denen die jeweiligen Elemente für diese Ressourcenart nicht vorgesehen sind.
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Peter Kochmann (Gst. GDI-NW)

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: ISO-Element Nr. 324: schema­Ascii
TestCase.description: Das Element ist nicht Bestandteil des NRW-Metadatenprofils.

TestStep.label: ISO-Element Nr. 324: schema­Ascii
TestStep.description: Das Element ist nicht Bestandteil des NRW-Metadatenprofils.

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'schemaAscii' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a minimum cardinality of 0 and a maximum cardinality of 0

TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'dateType' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a value that corresponds to one from the following list:
  • creation
  • publication
  • revision

TestCase.description: Der zulässige Werteumfang ist gegenüber der ISO 19115 eingeschränkt.

TestStep.description: Der zulässige Werteumfang ist gegenüber der ISO 19115 eingeschränkt.

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The type with localName 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' must contain one and only one of the following options:
  • attributes
  • features
  • dataset
  • other

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'maintenanceAndUpdateFrequency' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a value that corresponds to one from the following list:

  • weekly
  • fortnightly
  • annually
  • unknown

TestCase.label: ISO-Element Nr. 29: verantwortliche Stelle für den Datenbestand/die Anwendung
TestCase.description: Pflichtelement: eine für den Datenbestand/die Anwendung verantwortliche Stelle muss benannt sein.

TestStep.label: ISO-Element Nr. 29: verantwortliche Stelle für den Datenbestand/die Anwendung
TestStep.description: Pflichtelement: eine für den Datenbestand/die Anwendung verantwortliche Stelle muss benannt sein.

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'pointOfContact' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should not be empty if it's present
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $rid := $record//*[local-name()='fileIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*/text() let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='SV_ServiceIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/srv']/*[local-name()='pointOfContact' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if ($propertyFound[(count(*)=0 and not(text())) or (count(child::*)=1 and ((child::*[data(@codeList) and not(data(@codeListValue))]) or (child::*[local-name()='CharacterString' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' and not(text())])))]) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'pointOfContact', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'fileIdentifier': $rid, 'filename': local:filename($record) }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'descriptiveKeywords' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should not be empty if it's present
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $rid := $record//*[local-name()='fileIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*/text() let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='SV_ServiceIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/srv']/*[local-name()='descriptiveKeywords' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if ($propertyFound[(count(*)=0 and not(text())) or (count(child::*)=1 and ((child::*[data(@codeList) and not(data(@codeListValue))]) or (child::*[local-name()='CharacterString' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' and not(text())])))]) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'descriptiveKeywords', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'fileIdentifier': $rid, 'filename': local:filename($record) }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $rid := $record//*[local-name()='fileIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*/text() let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='SV_ServiceIdentification' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/srv']/*[local-name()='resourceConstraints' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if ($propertyFound[(count(*)=0 and not(text())) or (count(child::*)=1 and ((child::*[data(@codeList) and not(data(@codeListValue))]) or (child::*[local-name()='CharacterString' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' and not(text())])))]) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'resourceConstraints', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'fileIdentifier': $rid, 'filename': local:filename($record) }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: ISO-Element Nr. 187: Identifikator des Referenzsystems
TestCase.description: Pflichtelement in Angaben zum Referenzsystem: die Angabe des Identifikators muss vorhanden sein.

TestStep.label: ISO-Element Nr. 187: Identifikator des Referenzsystems
TestStep.description: Pflichtelement in Angaben zum Referenzsystem: die Angabe des Identifikators muss vorhanden sein.

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'referenceSystemIdentifier' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should not be empty if it's present
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $rid := $record//*[local-name()='fileIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*/text() let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='MD_ReferenceSystem' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='referenceSystemIdentifier' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if ($propertyFound[(count(*)=0 and not(text())) or (count(child::*)=1 and ((child::*[data(@codeList) and not(data(@codeListValue))]) or (child::*[local-name()='CharacterString' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' and not(text())])))]) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'referenceSystemIdentifier', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'fileIdentifier': $rid, 'filename': local:filename($record) }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
